conversation-text:
John Garrett: You remember that speech you used to give us, Nick? About how one man can accomplish anything once he realizes he can be something bigger? Well. Now I am.
Nick Fury: [beat, then] A *part*. A *part* of something bigger.
John: Is that how it went?
Phil Coulson: Not a great listener.
Nick Fury: If you tell me this whole Hydra path thing you took is because you *misheard* my damn "One Man" speech ...
John: I am the key to the future of the universe. I'm the origin --
Nick: (over him) You got it, right?
John: -- of all things.
Phil: Totally. Loud and clear.

conversation.name: John Garrett
conversation.phrase: You remember that speech you used to give us, Nick? About how one man can accomplish anything once he realizes he can be something bigger? Well. Now I am.
